popt4jlib

Interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntSetN1AllMovesMaker, IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker, IntSetN1RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMakerMT, IntSetN21AllMovesMaker, IntSetN21GraphAllMovesMaker, IntSetN2AllMovesMaker, IntSetN2RXPAllMovesMaker, IntSetN2RXPFirstImprovingGraphAllMovesMaker, IntSetN2RXPGraphAllMovesMaker

    public interface AllChromosomeMakerIntf
    allows the definition of the neighborhood of a point in a search space that is needed by Local-Search algorithms in combinatorial optimization problems.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java
